title: Solana, XRP, ETH Extend Losses as Bitcoin’s $91K Support Back in Focus
contentSnippet: The one-month chart shows BTC still locked inside a descending structure from early November’s highs, with the latest rebound producing another lower high.

title: Bitcoin unlikely to replicate January’s surge to new high: 21Shares founder
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s downturn has barely anything to do with “anything crypto specific,” but it’s unlikely to surge early next year, says 21Shares co-founder Ophelia Snyder.

title: XRP sentiment plummets, which could set token up for rally: Santiment
contentSnippet: Santiment says social sentiment toward XRP has hit its lowest levels since October, entering the fear zone, but suggested that has preceded a rally in the past.

title: チェーンリンク現物ETF、初日に64億円の流入で好調　ソラナETFからは最大流出
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨チェーンリンク現物ETFの取引初日に64億円が流入し好調な滑り出しとなった。一方ソラナ現物ETFからは過去最大の資金流出があった。

title: EU Opens Antitrust Probe Into Meta's New AI Policy For WhatsApp
contentSnippet: The EU Commission’s probe excludes Italy, where the country's competition authority is already pursuing separate proceedings against Meta.

title: 国際通貨基金（IMF）、ステーブルコインの規制断片化に警鐘
contentSnippet: 国際通貨基金が今週、ステーブルコイン市場の評価報告書を公開し、各国の規制枠組みの断片化が金融安定性を脅かし監視を弱体化させ、国境を越えた決済の発展を遅らせていると警告した。

title: DOGE ETF Buzz Meets Bearish Reality as Dogecoin Prints Fresh Lower Lows
contentSnippet: Technical analysis shows DOGE failed to hold key support levels, suggesting continued downside unless buyers reclaim critical price points.

title: Precious Metals Soar, Bitcoin Stalls as Investors Hedge Fed 'Policy Error'
contentSnippet: Markets are hedging a Fed misstep, driving gold and silver higher while Bitcoin lags as traders reassess risk.

title: Ex-Signature Bank execs launch blockchain-powered bank N3XT
contentSnippet: Signature Bank founder ​​Scott Shay has created N3XT, a bank aiming to provide instant 24-hour payments on a private blockchain.

title: XRP at Risk of $2.05 Retest, Analysts Warn, as Bitcoin Gives Back Weekly Gains
contentSnippet: Spot XRP ETFs have now attracted nearly $850 million in inflows since launching in mid-November — one of the strongest altcoin ETF starts on record — suggesting long-horizon capital continues to accum

title: CZとピーター・シフが激論交わす、ビットコインvs金「どちらが真の価値保存手段か」
contentSnippet: バイナンス創設者CZ氏と金支持派エコノミストのシフ氏が4日、ドバイでビットコイン対トークン化金の討論を実施。金塊の真贋確認場面が話題となり、検証可能性や価値保存機能をめぐり対照的な見解を示した。

title: Solana and Coinbase’s Base connect together using Chainlink
contentSnippet: Base launched a Chainlink-secured bridge to Solana, enabling crosschain asset transfers between the Ethereum layer-2 and the Solana blockchain.

title: Here's How Much Bitcoin, XRP, Ether, Solana May Move on Friday's Inflation Report
contentSnippet: A softer inflation report could lower the 10-year Treasury yield and support cryptocurrencies.

title: OpenAI Ordered to Hand Over 20M ChatGPT Logs in NYT Copyright Case
contentSnippet: A federal judge rejected OpenAI’s bid to limit discovery, directing the company to produce de-identified user logs central to the case.

title: アジア最大級のWeb3カンファレンス「WebX2026」、チケット販売開始
contentSnippet: アジア最大級のWeb3カンファレンス「WebX2026」が2026年7月13日・14日にザ・プリンスパークタワー東京で開催。本日よりVIP Pass、Business Pass、Booth Passのチケット販売を開始。開幕セール価格は2月28日まで。

title: ビットコイン、政府系ファンドは8万ドル台で買い増し　日銀政策と円キャリートレードにも注目
contentSnippet: ブラックロックのフィンクCEOは、複数の政府系ファンドがビットコインの大幅下落局面で買い増していたことを明らかにした。一方、CryptoQuant CEOは2022年のような大暴落は起きにくいと分析。市場は12月の日銀政策決定に注目、円キャリートレードの動向がビットコイン含むリスク資産に影響を与える可能性を考察する。

title: Strategy won’t be forced to sell Bitcoin if stock drops, Bitwise CIO says
contentSnippet: Strategy has $1.4 billion in cash, no debt due until 2027, and Bitcoin's price is above the company’s cost basis, making a sale unlikely, argues Matt Hougan.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Crypto’s Next Breakout Will Come From Infrastructure, Not Narratives, Hashed Says
contentSnippet: The Korean venture firm’s 2026 thesis argues that stablecoins, AI agents, and on-chain credit markets are becoming the foundation of a real digital economy, with Asia emerging as the first region wher

title: 「ストラテジー社はビットコインを売却しないだろう」Bitwise幹部、株価指数除外の影響を分析
contentSnippet: Bitwiseのマット・ホーガン最高投資責任者は、ストラテジー社は株価指数から除外されてもビットコインは売却しないだろうとの見方を示した。その根拠を説明している。

title: SOL price capped at $140 as altcoin ETF rivals reshape crypto demand
contentSnippet: SOL struggles to extend its gains as declining activity, falling leverage demand and competition from newly launched spot altcoin ETFs challenge Solana’s price rebound.

title: Meta shares climb on report of possible 30% metaverse budget cut
contentSnippet: Meta is reportedly cooling on the metaverse with planned 30% cuts in its virtual reality research department, Reality Labs, which shareholders seemingly support.

title: XRPレジャーの流通速度が年間最高値を記録　オンチェーン活動が急増＝CryptoQuant分析
contentSnippet: XRPレジャーの流通速度流通速度が12月2日に年間最高値0.0324を記録。大口保有者による2100億円規模の買い増しや取引所準備金の減少など、オンチェーン活動の活発化が確認された。CryptoQuant分析。

title: 年末にかけての下落リスクを軽減する価格帯は？　ビットコイン最新市場分析＝Glassnode
contentSnippet: Glassnodeが仮想通貨ビットコイン市場の最新週間レポートを発表。需要低迷と含み損拡大の中、年末の下落リスクを抑える価格帯などを分析している。

title: JPモルガンがストラテジーのビットコイン売却回避能力を評価、「マイナーの動きより重要」
contentSnippet: JPモルガンのアナリストが、ストラテジーのビットコイン売却回避能力がBTC価格の短期見通しにおいてマイナー活動より重要だと分析した。

title: 21シェアーズ、米国初のスイ（SUI）連動2倍レバレッジETFを上場
contentSnippet: 21シェアーズが米国証券取引委員会の承認を得て、スイ(SUI)の価格に連動する初のレバレッジETFをナスダックに上場した。日次リターンの2倍を提供する商品で、スイエコシステムに関連する初のETFとなる。

title: Stablecoin Adoption Could Stifle Central Bank Control, IMF Warns
contentSnippet: Stablecoins have the potential to broaden individuals’ access to financial services, but that may come at the cost of central banks, per IMF.

title: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse Expects Bitcoin to Hit $180K Next Year
contentSnippet: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse thinks Bitcoin will be trading at $180,000 at the close of 2026, nearly double the current price.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Myriad Moves: Bitcoin and Ethereum Recovery Odds Rise as Traders Flip Bullish
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on where Bitcoin and Ethereum are headed next, plus odds of another major liquidation event.

title: Hua Xia state-linked Chinese bank tokenizes $600M in yuan bonds
contentSnippet: The bond was auctioned off to holders of the digital yuan, a central bank digital currency (CBDC) developed by the Chinese government.

title: Former Binance.US CEO launches stablecoin platform ahead of L1 network
contentSnippet: After securing $20 million in seed funding for the project in January, Brian Shroder announced a step toward 1Money’s planned stablecoin network.

title: Solana and Ethereum Network Base Are Now Connected Thanks to Coinbase and Chainlink
contentSnippet: Solana and Base are now connected thanks to a new bridge secured by Chainlink's interoperability protocol and crypto exchange Coinbase.

title: Canton Network Creator Snags Strategic Investment from Wall Street Giants
contentSnippet: BNY, Nasdaq, iCapital and S&P Global invested in Digital Assets, powering blockchain infrastructure for tokenized real-world assets.

title: Kraken Partners With Deutsche Börse as Europe Looks to Rival Wall Street in Crypto
contentSnippet: Deutsche Börse Group (DBG) and Kraken announced a strategic partnership signalling acceleration of crypto adoption across Europe and a clear intention to compete with Wall Street.

title: Privacy-First 'Alien' Identity System Aims to Prove Users Are Human in the Age of AI
contentSnippet: Alien’s privacy-focused decentralized app verifies users without storing biometrics or government IDs. Here's how it works.

title: After Faking Death, Zerebro Founder Unveils AI-Penned Manifesto and New Solana Coin
contentSnippet: The manifesto argues for a future in which AI and humans will converge biologically, chemically, and surgically in a new form of humanity.

title: Bitcoin Could Continue Chopping Below $95K Into Year-End and Altcoins Could Benefit, Analyst Says
contentSnippet: Low-liquidity in December may cap bitcoin's recovery rally, but rangebound trading for the largest crypto could benefit smaller digital assets, Wincent's Paul Howard said.

title: CFTC Gives Green Light to Spot Crypto Trading as Bitnomial Exchange Readies for Launch
contentSnippet: Acting CFTC Chair Caroline Pham described the move as unprecedented.

title: Coinbase, Chainlink Introduce Base-Solana Bridge to Link Ecosystems
contentSnippet: The bridge, secured by Chainlink's Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol, allows users to trade and interact with Solana-based tokens on Base-based dapps.

title: Bitcoin’s Negative Correlation With Nasdaq Persists, and History Suggests a Bottom May Be Forming
contentSnippet: Historical patterns show that bitcoin often bottoms when its correlation with the Nasdaq 100 breaks down, a dynamic now appearing for the fourth time in five years.
